name: @ngx-i18nsupport/ngx-i18nsupport-lib
description: A Typescript library to work with Angular generated i18n files (xliff, xmb)
author: Martin Roob <martinroob65@gmail.com> (www.roobsoft.de)

scripts.prepublishOnly: node --eval "console.error('ERROR: Trying to publish a package that has been compiled by Ivy. This is not allowed.\nPlease delete and rebuild the package, without compiling with Ivy, before attempting to publish.\n')" && exit 1
